questions.text: All Business have an aim to make profit for their owners?

questions.choiceA: A: Sets up the safest form of business organization
questions.choiceB: B: Is Legally liable for any debts of the business
questions.choiceC: C: Forms a business with another single person
questions.choiceD: D: Has exclusive responsibility for running the business

questions.text: In Comparison to other forms of businesses, sole proprietors face the problem of?
Which of the following is least likely to be classed as a non-profit organization?
questions.choiceA: A: Private fee paying schools or colleges

questions.text: The number of partners a partnership can legally have is between?
